Package controller

Class CompanyRepresentativeController

java.lang.Object
controller.CompanyRepresentativeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/representatives") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173") public class CompanyRepresentativeController extends Object
REST controller for company representative operations. Handles internship opportunity creation and application management.
Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6

      Create a new internship opportunity.
      Parameters:
      repId - The representative's ID
      request - The internship creation request
      Returns:
      The created internship opportunity

    • getMyInternships

      Get all internship opportunities created by the representative.
      Parameters:
      repId - The representative's ID
      Returns:
      List of representative's internship opportunities

    • updateInternship

      @PutMapping("/internships/{opportunityId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<Void>> updateInternship(@RequestParam String repId, @PathVariable String opportunityId, @RequestBody CreateInternshipRequest request)
      Update an existing internship opportunity (only if pending).
      Parameters:
      repId - The representative's ID
      opportunityId - The internship opportunity ID
      request - The updated internship data
      Returns:
      Success response

    • deleteOpportunity

      @DeleteMapping("/internships/{opportunityId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<Void>> deleteOpportunity(@RequestParam String repId, @PathVariable String opportunityId)
      Delete an internship opportunity. Can only delete PENDING or REJECTED opportunities.
      Parameters:
      repId - The representative's ID
      opportunityId - The internship opportunity ID
      Returns:
      Success response

    • getApplicationsForOpportunity

      @GetMapping("/internships/{opportunityId}/applications") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<List<ApplicationWithStudentDTO>>> getApplicationsForOpportunity(@RequestParam String repId, @PathVariable String opportunityId)
      Get all applications for a specific internship opportunity with student details.
      Parameters:
      repId - The representative's ID
      opportunityId - The internship opportunity ID
      Returns:
      List of applications with student details for the opportunity

      Parameters:
      repId - The representative's ID

      Success response
